#summary How to enable OAuth on your PHP installation
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy,Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

With the release of v1.0.3, the psYiiExtensions library supports the [http://pecl.php.net/package/oauth PHP oauth library]. In order to utilize this you must first install the library and enable it.

This mini-guide will explain how to do it.
